entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
